prizes.name: Staff Pick
prizes.description: HackIllinois staff will be reviewing projects to see which one we find to be the most creative, technically impressive, and original!

prizes.name: Cargill’s Choice: Best Food Related Hack
prizes.description: This will be awarded to the project that incorporates the theme of food in its usage in the most novel and practical way.

prizes.name: Capital One: Best Financial Hack
prizes.description: This will be awarded to the most novel project pertaining to a field related to finance! Whether it be about managing business accounts or personal budgets or spending, the project must creatively incorporate some fiscal theme.
